verses.verse: Then <S%H7126>came<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph:<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> and <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> and <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And they <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> by the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and he was not in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of them that <S%H3259>gathered<s%> themselves together <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H5712>company<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah;<s%> but <S%H4191>died<s%> in his own <S%H2399>sin,<s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons.<s%>

<S%H4100>Why<s%> should the <S%H8034>name<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%> be <S%H1639>done<s%> <S%H1639>away<s%> from <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H4940>family,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>son?<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> to us therefore a <S%H272>possession<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brothers<s%> of our <S%H1>father.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7126>brought<s%> their <S%H4941>cause<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

The <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3651>right:<s%> you shall surely <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H272>possession<s%> of an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H251>brothers;<s%> and you shall cause the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> to them.

And you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> and have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> then you shall cause his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> to his <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> he have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H251>brothers.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H251>brothers,<s%> then you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to his <S%H7607>kinsman<s%> that is <S%H7138>next<s%> to him of his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and he shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it: and it shall be to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2708>statute<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5927>Get<s%> you up <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5682>Abarim,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And when you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> it, you <S%H1571>also<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to your <S%H5971>people,<s%> as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> was <S%H622>gathered.<s%>

For you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against my <S%H6310>commandment<s%> in the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin,<s%> in the <S%H4808>strife<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> me at the <S%H4325>water<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> that is the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
Let the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of the <S%H7307>spirits<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> <S%H6485>set<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%>

<S%H834>Which<s%> may <S%H3318>go<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H834>which<s%> may <S%H935>go<s%> in <S%H6440>before<s%> them, and <S%H834>which<s%> may <S%H3318>lead<s%> them out, and <S%H834>which<s%> may <S%H935>bring<s%> them in; that the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> be not as <S%H6629>sheep<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> you <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and <S%H5564>lay<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> on him;

And <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation;<s%> and give him a <S%H6680>charge<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5414>put<s%> some of your <S%H1935>honor<s%> on him, that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may be <S%H8085>obedient.<s%>

And he shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> who shall <S%H7592>ask<s%> counsel for him after the <S%H4941>judgment<s%> of <S%H224>Urim<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> his <S%H6310>word<s%> shall they <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and <S%H5921>at<s%> his <S%H6310>word<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> in, both he, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him, even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him: and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> him <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation:<s%>
And he <S%H5564>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on him, and gave him a <S%H6680>charge,<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
